variable.name: AuthService
variable.description: Full URL for the WSDL Authentication SOAP Service of the DRL.

variable.name: JobsService
variable.description: Full URL for the WSDL/SOAP Jobs Service of the DRL.

variable.name: UsersService
variable.description: Full URL for the WSDL/SOAP User Service of the DRL.

variable.name: PostageStampService
variable.description: Full URL for the WSDL/SOAP Postage Stamp Service of the DRL.

variable.name: VOPlotService
variable.description: Full URL to a cgi script that can plot from a VOTable file.

variable.name: helpEmail
variable.description: Email used for technical support.

variable.name: PSPSQueryExamplesURL
variable.description: PSPS Plugins URL is needed for query examples within the PSI Help Class.

variable.name: MopsSchemaURL
variable.description: Full URL to MOPS Schema information.

variable.name: PostageStampStatusURL
variable.description: Full URL to the internal IPP Postage Stamp Status page where all requests can be viewed.

variable.name: PostageStampNoticeURL
variable.description: Full URL to the internal IPP Postage Stamp Status page where all requests can be viewed.

variable.name: NewsWikiURL
variable.description: Full URL to the PSI News Wiki.

variable.name: HelpWikiURL
variable.description: PSI Help Wiki page.

variable.name: MainWikiURL
variable.description: PSI Help Wiki page.

variable.name: StiltsJar
variable.description: Location fo the stilts jar file needed for quick downloads.

variable.name: DefaultPSPSSchemaGroup
variable.description: This is name of the schema group that PSI needs to load things like the main schema, surveys, and filters. This is mainly needed for the PSPSSchemaClass session instance.

variable.name: DefaultPSPSSchema
variable.description: This is name of the schema that PSI needs to load things like the main schema, surveys, and filters. This is mainly needed for the PSPSSchemaClass session instance.

variable.name: DefaultMopsSchemaGroup
variable.description: Default schema group for MOPS functions.

variable.name: DefaultMopsSchema
variable.description: Default MOPS schema context that serves as the default MOPS catalog selection.

variable.name: DefaultMopsExportSchema
variable.description: Default MOPS Export schema context.

variable.name: DefaultMyDBSchemaGroup
variable.description: This is name of the schema group that is for personal databases (CasJobs MyDB).

variable.name: DefaultMyDBSchema
variable.description: This is name of the scheme for the personal database of users.
